body_html:
Created a fast hack to load libcuda at runtime:
https://gist.github.com/pkit/e06c2d23046a265a4f0fea302a5ce539
P.S. the "fast cuda device memory allocator" probably needs more love. Because currently it looks ugly.
Can probably pull all the pretty interfaces from StreamExecutor there, but needs much more work. Because of Deallocate(DeviceMemoryBase *mem) decision.

https://gist.github.com/pkit/e06c2d23046a265a4f0fea302a5ce539
P.S. the "fast cuda device memory allocator" probably needs more love. Because currently it looks ugly.
